universal.title: Peek-a-Boo Adventure
universal.content: Once upon a time, little {name} loved to play peek-a-boo with mommy and daddy. Every time they said "Where’s {name}?" {name} would pop out with a giggle!

boy.title: Little Boy Blue
boy.content: {name} was a brave little boy who loved to help the animals on the farm. He blew his horn gently to call the sheep back home.

girl.title: Mary’s Little Lamb
girl.content: {name} had a little lamb whose fleece was white as snow. Wherever {name} went, the lamb was sure to go, following with soft little footsteps.

universal.title: The Three Little Pigs
universal.content: Once {name} met three little pigs who needed help building houses. Together they built straw, stick, and brick homes, learning teamwork and perseverance.

universal.title: The Magical Paintbrush
universal.content: {name} discovered a paintbrush that brought drawings to life. When {name} painted a butterfly, it fluttered right off the page and danced in the garden.

boy.title: Captain {name} and the Sea Monster
boy.content: Brave Captain {name} sailed the seven seas. When a mischievous sea monster blocked the way, {name} used clever thinking to calm it with a song.

girl.title: {name} and the Flower Fairies
girl.content: In a secret meadow, {name} found tiny fairies who tended to flowers. Together, they painted petals in rainbow colors and sang gentle lullabies.

universal.title: The Lost Star
universal.content: One night, {name} spotted a star falling from the sky. On a magical journey, {name} helped the star find its way back home among the constellations.

boy.title: {name} and the Dragon’s Puzzle
boy.content: {name} ventured into the dragon’s cave to solve a tricky riddle. With courage and wit, {name} unlocked the puzzle and became a hero of the valley.

girl.title: Princess {name} and the Enchanted Forest
girl.content: Princess {name} followed glowing footprints into an enchanted forest. There she befriended talking animals and restored color to the flowers with a magical song.

universal.title: The Time-Traveling Telescope
universal.content: {name} found an old telescope that showed scenes from history. From dinosaurs to ancient kingdoms, each night brought a new adventure through time.

boy.title: {name} and the Robot Rebellion
boy.content: When the town’s helpful robots started acting strangely, {name} teamed up with Robo-X to uncover a secret code and restore peace to the workshop.

girl.title: {name} and the Secret Garden Society
girl.content: Curious {name} discovered a hidden club of gardeners who grew magical plants. Together, they nurtured a seed that bloomed into a glowing moonflower.

universal.title: Quest for the Crystal Key
universal.content: {name} embarked on a quest across mountains and seas to find the legendary Crystal Key. Along the way, lessons of bravery, friendship, and kindness shone bright.

boy.title: {name} and the Midnight Wizards
boy.content: When shadows crept over the kingdom, {name} joined the Midnight Wizards to learn spells of light. Together, they banished darkness and saved the realm.

girl.title: {name} and the Phoenix Feather
girl.content: Guided by an ancient map, {name} searched for a phoenix feather that grants hope. Through deserts and ruins, {name} proved that courage and compassion lead the way.
